price: (Nkͻmhyεni), nokorε sε, Yεn na Yɛsiane Qur’aan no nkakrankakra maa woͻ,
arabic: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نَزَّلۡنَا عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ تَنزِيلٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: innā naḥnu nazzalnā ʿalayka al-qur'āna tanzīlan
